keyMoments.title: Shirahoshi's Brave Decision to Save Fish-Man Island
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi makes the courageous decision to swim into the open ocean to lure the massive ark Noah away from Fish-Man Island, putting her own life at risk to save her people.
keyMoments.significance: This represents a major character transformation for Shirahoshi from a fearful, confined princess to a brave hero willing to sacrifice herself for her kingdom.
keyMoments.quote: I must save everyone on Fish-Man Island!

keyMoments.title: Shirahoshi Faces Vander Decken's Attack
keyMoments.description: After rejecting Vander Decken IX's marriage proposal, Shirahoshi must evade another barrage of deadly projectiles while her brothers defend her.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Shirahoshi's continued bravery in the face of Vander Decken's obsessive pursuit.

reveals.information: Shirahoshi demonstrates tremendous courage by actively risking her life to save her people

keyMoments.title: Luffy Launches Toward Noah
keyMoments.description: Luffy, with Sanji's help, propels himself toward Noah's chains to stop it from destroying Fish-Man Island, creating an air bubble to breathe underwater.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's determination to save Fish-Man Island despite the severe disadvantage of being underwater as a Devil Fruit user.

keyMoments.title: Underwater Battle Against Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: Luffy confronts Hody Jones in the open ocean and realizes the extreme disadvantage he faces against a fish-man underwater.
keyMoments.significance: One of Luffy's most vulnerable combat situations, facing a fish-man in his element while weakened by the sea.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Nearly Drowns
keyMoments.description: Hody bursts Luffy's protective air bubble, causing him to begin drowning and face imminent death until Fukaboshi intervenes.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most life-threatening moments for Luffy in the series, showcasing the deadly consequences of his Devil Fruit weakness in water.

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Kirisame Scythe Debut
keyMoments.description: Hody reveals his deadly weapon Kirisame, a razor-sharp curved scythe blade that attaches to his dorsal fin, demonstrating its lethality by decapitating an oarfish.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Hody's signature weapon and showcases his enhanced underwater combat capabilities.

keyMoments.title: Hody Battles Luffy Underwater
keyMoments.description: Hody confronts Luffy in the ocean, using his fish-man advantages and superior swimming to dominate the fight.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hody's tactical intelligence in exploiting Luffy's weaknesses.

keyMoments.title: Hody Bursts Luffy's Bubble
keyMoments.description: Hody instantly destroys Luffy's protective air bubble, causing him to drown and nearly killing him.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hody's ruthlessness and puts Luffy in mortal danger.

keyMoments.title: Hody Betrays and Stabs Vander Decken
keyMoments.description: Hody reaches Noah's deck and fatally stabs his ally Vander Decken IX with his trident, intending to deactivate Decken's powers and drop Noah onto Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Hody's true ruthlessness and willingness to sacrifice anyone, even allies, to achieve his destructive goals. This betrayal demonstrates that his hatred supersedes all loyalty.

abilities.description: A razor-sharp curved scythe blade that Hody attaches to his dorsal fin, allowing him to cut opponents while swimming at high speed.

reveals.information: Hody's true ruthlessness revealed through betrayal of Vander Decken, showing he values destruction above all alliances
Possesses the weapon Kirisame, a deadly scythe attached to his dorsal fin

keyMoments.title: Fukaboshi Saves Luffy from Drowning
keyMoments.description: Prince Fukaboshi arrives just in time to deflect Hody's finishing blow and provides Luffy with air, saving him from drowning and certain death.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Fukaboshi as a crucial ally to the Straw Hats and demonstrates the growing alliance between Luffy and the Neptune royal family. Shows his capabilities as crown prince.
keyMoments.quote: I won't let you harm Luffy!

keyMoments.title: Fukaboshi Defends Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi, along with his brothers Manboshi and Ryuboshi, defends their sister Shirahoshi from Vander Decken's projectile attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the protective bond between the Neptune siblings and Fukaboshi's role as eldest brother.

relationships.description: Fukaboshi saves Luffy's life by providing air and deflecting Hody's attack, cementing their alliance.

evolutionMoments.description: Fukaboshi saves Luffy from drowning and Hody's finishing blow.

name.japanese: バンダー・デッケン九世

keyMoments.title: Vander Decken's Marriage Proposal and Attack
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken offers Shirahoshi his hand in marriage again. Upon rejection, he releases another barrage of deadly projectiles at her.
keyMoments.significance: Continues to demonstrate Vander Decken's obsessive pursuit of Shirahoshi.

keyMoments.title: Vander Decken Stabbed by Hody
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken is fatally stabbed by Hody Jones with a trident in a shocking betrayal by his ally. Hody's goal is to deactivate Decken's Mark-Mark Fruit powers to drop Noah onto Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: This betrayal shows the consequence of allying with someone consumed by hatred. It potentially deactivates the Mark-Mark Fruit's effect on Noah, threatening to drop the massive ship directly onto Fish-Man Island.

reveals.information: Fatally stabbed by Hody Jones, betrayed by his ally

keyMoments.title: Sanji Helps Launch Luffy
keyMoments.description: Sanji assists Luffy by helping propel him toward Noah's chains, demonstrating teamwork between the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the cooperation between crew members in battle and Sanji's support role in this arc.
